meanings.definition: The act of turning the palm or sole of the foot upward or outward.
meanings.sent1: During the exercise, the instructor demonstrated proper supination of the wrist.
meanings.sent2: She noticed her supination while holding the cup with her palm facing the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The robot's supination of its hand made it look like it was waving.
meanings.sent4: His supination of the foot was so exaggerated, it seemed like he was trying to walk on the sides of his feet.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast's flawless supination of her hand caught the judges' attention.
